Package edu.ntnu.Backend.model.DAO

Class UserDAO

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.Backend.model.DAO.UserDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Entity public class UserDAO extends Object implements Serializable
This class function as a representation of the table user from the database. This class contains the same fields as the columns from the database. Access methods for these values is also contained in this class.
